summary: This appears to be an FBI 302 form documenting trial preparation with a witness (likely a victim or associate) who was shown photographic exhibits (GX series) and provided statements about connections between individuals, including Maxwell and Epstein, regarding scheduling and recruitment for massage work at Epstein's house.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Jeffrey' or 'Jeff', mentioned in context of individuals being scheduled to work for him and his house being visited.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Described as the person with the 'proper accent' who called to schedule an individual (El) to work for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as calling to schedule individuals to work for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Trial Preparation Session
events.description: AUSA and SA prepared a witness for trial testimony, showing them photographic exhibits (GX series) and obtaining clarifying statements.

keyFacts: A witness was shown photographic exhibits (GX-105, GX-113, GX-114, GX-112, GX-11, GX-15) during trial preparation.
The witness stated Maxwell was the person with a 'proper accent' who called to schedule an individual (El) to work for Jeffrey Epstein.
The witness recalled a third individual, besides the witness and Maxwell, who also asked someone to work for Jeffrey Epstein, believed to be a female and a recruiter.
The witness remembers going to Jeffrey Epstein's house for the first time with another individual.
